{"id":557135436,"lang":"cpp","time":"6 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1631996545,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/557135436/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zigzag Conversion","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string convert(string s, int numRows) {\n        int n = s.length();\n        string res = \"\";\n        \n        if(n <= 1)\n            return s;\n        \n        int increment = 2 * (numRows - 1);\n        for(int i = 0; i < numRows; i++)\n        {\n            for(int j = i; j < n; j += increment)\n            {\n                res += s[j];\n                if(i != 0 && i != (numRows - 1) && (j + (increment - 2 * i)) < n)\n                {\n                    res += s[j + (increment - 2 * i)];\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion"}
